borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="">The proposed&nbsp;dormer extension&nbsp;by reason of&nbsp;its position over the side roof slope, its scale,&nbsp;lack of appropriate set back from the eaves and party wall with neighbouring property at Number 107 <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="Halbutt" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="lplbfr93xamyi1z7w" style="">Halbutt</span> Street would&nbsp;constitute&nbsp;overbearing, disproportionate, and inappropriate development that fails to respect the character of the host <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="dwellinghouse" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="lplbfr93mj0gcveo5" style="">dwellinghouse</span> and the&nbsp;wider surrounding area including the non-designated heritage asset which is the Becontree Estate. In addition, the proposed side dormer extension would&nbsp;negatively impact on the openness&nbsp;at roof level between the application dwelling and neighbouring property at&nbsp;Number 111 <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="Halbutt" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="lplbfrcfho16ngtfm" style="">Halbutt</span> Street.&nbsp;The proposed development is therefore contrary to:</p><ul><li>Paragraphs 126, 130,&nbsp;134, and 203 of&nbsp;the National Planning Policy Framework (<span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="NPPF" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="lplbfrxla8vsrgaj1">NPPF</span>, September 2023)</li><li>Policies&nbsp;D4,&nbsp;D6,&nbsp;and HC1 of the&nbsp;London Plan (March 2021)</li><li>Policies&nbsp;CP2 and&nbsp;CP3 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)</li><li>Policies&nbsp;BP2, BP8, and&nbsp;BP11 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)</li><li>Policies&nbsp;SP2, DMD 1,&nbsp;DMD 4, and DMD 6&nbsp;of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local Plan 2037: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li><li>Paragraph 5.6.2 (a &amp; b) of the Residential Extensions and Alterations of the&nbsp;Supplementary Planning Documents (SPD) (February 2012)&nbsp;</li></ul>
description: Construction of a rear and side dormer extension
